publicationStmt.publisher: By R. B[lower?] for William Lugger, and are to be sould at his shop in Holborne, ouer against S. Andrewes Church,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "Proude earth behould, as thou art we shall bee.".
Printer's name conjectured and publication date supplied by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop in Holborne, ouer against S. Andrewes Church
